title: $2.6 Billion: Historic 11,000-Year Sentence Handed to Turkish Crypto Exchange CEO
description: The Anatolian 9th High Criminal Court in Turkey has issued a sweeping 11,196-year prison sentence to Faruk Fatih Özer,, former CEO of the now-defunct Thodex cryptocurrency exchange, on several charges. These charges include “establishing, managing and being a member of an organization,” “qualified fraud,” and “laundering of property values.” The court further imposed a pentalty […]

title: FBI Traces $41 Million Cryptocurrency Theft From Stake.com to Lazarus Group
description: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) says it has confirmed that North Korea’s Lazarus Group was behind the crypto theft of about $41 million from online crypto casino and sports betting platform Stake.com. The FBI has provided a number of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain (BSC), and Polygon addresses that received stolen funds from Stake.com. […]

title: Where are All of the AI Jobs?  A Comprehensive Look at the Global Market
description: As artificial intelligence continues its rapid evolution, the employment landscape is undergoing a profound transformation. title: Top 5 Oracle dApps on Boba Network: Reliability and Security for Real-World Applications
description: Oracle dApps, a crucial component in the blockchain and decentralized application (dApp) ecosystem, are the bridge between the blockchain world and real-world data. title: Banks Suffer $1,555,000,000,000 in Deposit Flight in One Year As JPMorgan Chase and Financial Giants Fight for Wealthy Clients: Report
description:
New numbers on the global banking system are shedding light on just how much money depositors have pulled out of their bank accounts in the last year. According to the latest data from the Federal Reserve of St Louis, US banks have faced $605 billion in deposit flight in a year. And total deposits at […]
